scripts.build:public: pnpm verify:public-layout && pnpm -C apps/public run build
scripts.render:build:public: corepack pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prod=false && corepack pnpm -C apps/public run build
scripts.render:build:staff: corepack pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prod=false && corepack pnpm -C apps/staff run build
scripts.render:build:user: corepack pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prod=false && corepack pnpm -C apps/user run build
scripts.render:build:api: corepack pnpm install --frozen-lockfile && corepack pnpm -C apps/api run build
scripts.dev:public: pnpm verify:public-layout && dotenv -e .env.local -- npm -w apps/public run dev -- -p 3100
scripts.dev:api: dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3103 npm -w apps/api run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3100 pnpm -C apps/public dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3101 pnpm -C apps/staff dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3102 pnpm -C apps/user dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm -C apps/org dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm -C apps/console dev"
scripts.dev:all:with-api: concurrently -k "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3100 pnpm -C apps/public dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3101 pnpm -C apps/staff dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3102 pnpm -C apps/user dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm -C apps/org dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- pnpm -C apps/console dev" "dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-env PORT=3103 pnpm -C apps/api dev"
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --dir packages/db exec prisma migrate dev
